title: Shaakhaahaari
overview: When the lives of some innocent people start getting intertwined in unforeseen situations they find themselves trapped in a murder mystery. This mysterious butchery infolds in a vegetarian restaurant run by a virtuous Chef Subbanna.
tagline: **Vegan Alert:** Viewers discretion advised

title: Bad Cop
overview: BAD COP follows the life of a corrupt Policeman, INSPECTOR TAFARI. The story tells of how he aids many criminals in carrying out their criminal activities in his territory and further encourages them by partnering with them for financial gain. He would go as far as burning criminal case files to remain in favour with drug lords. As the story proceeds, TAFARI falls in love with a lady named MIA, who changes his life's trajectory.

title: Roadkill
overview: A thief operating along the highways of rural Australia gets caught in the crossfires of an ongoing police investigation after he mugs a serial killer.
tagline: Out here, don't stop...

title: Kallan
overview: A son of a hunter starts dealing with guns to make his ends meet. Little does he know that fate would start hunting him and his friends for his decisions.

title: i heard you like true crime
overview: The worst fears are the ones we make on our own.

title: Bounce
overview: Two college roommates conspired a plot to seduce an unknowing female classmate into their lair of deception. It wasn’t the first time but even with the horrifying reality of a plan gone fatally wrong, they were unable to stop their desire to repeat the crime. Their plan dangerously backfired with a supernatural retribution from a vengeful poltergeist of the missing tennis player.

title: Kill the Children First
overview: A teen ballerina, her crazy in love boyfriend, and his sketchy best friend with a stolen gun, get stuck in the deepest labyrinths of crime's underworld over a misplaced cell phone that contains a compromising video.
tagline: Youth is a bullet fired in the mist!

title: The Journalist
overview: London, 1980s. Peter Bendford is a retired criminal who now wants to enjoy the peace of running his bar. When the body of a former associate shows up dead in his establishment, and whilst a meticulous criminal journalist uncovers evidence against him, a police interrogation is Bendford’s last chance to clear his name.
tagline: A retired past, a present suspicion.

title: 猎影追凶
overview: A tragedy occurred in a remote village. Criminal investigation captain Wang Dazhong and others conducted an in-depth investigation. The case fell into a puzzle. Wrong clues and repeated escapes made the case more complicated. Crime is still escalating, but the criminal police team members are not afraid, discovering the mystery close at hand, and finally bring the "demon shadow" hiding in the world to justice.

title: Last 6 Hours
overview: Four robbers come together and plot to rob a place in six hours. But there are some unforeseen problems. How do they deal with them and what will happen to them?

title: Clutch
overview: Detectives Clutch and Angel navigate a criminal underworld with the help of three women, whom Clutch is familiar with, to solve the disappearance of a group of women. Their investigations take them deeper into unknown and even more corrupt places in the underworld, that are worse than they thought.
tagline: Things are worse than they thought.

title: The Marino Family
overview: The story of Tommy Marino and his association in The Marino Family, covering his relationship with his partners, Papa Louie and Leonardo.

title: Routa
overview: A man is released from prison after 22 years. He tries to live a simple life as a farmer. At the same time, a company director is fighting a hostile takeover from a bigger corporation. Two different kind of journeys collide in sudden ways.

title: Bootleg Church
overview: After a Bishop dies, a new senior pastor, pastor Moore, inherits the church, it's congregation, and assets. Soon, pastor Moore's lies, lust, and greed entangle everyone and everything around him into his world of crime.
tagline: You will always reap what you've sown.

title: The Bunny
overview: Two high school seniors seek a fulfilling job that’ll give them the respect they’ve always wanted, but their wishes come true in the worst way possible when they find themselves working for a mob boss who dresses up as a bunny.
tagline: To Win, You Have To Lose

title: Arrive Alive
overview: Years after killing an abusive boyfriend, two women are forced to reconnect when his brother is released from prison with an intent for revenge.
tagline: Shallow Grave, Deep Trouble

title: Tallukh
overview: An Inspector tries to figure out a case of serial kidnapping in neighborhood simultaneously a couple live their happy life, soon to realize everything is connected.
tagline: 3 Stories. 1 Connection.

title: Yucca Fest
overview: It's all part of the plan as four friends in southern California decide to rob a music festival. The only problem; someone else already has their eye on the money.
tagline: find out who you are

title: Same Night Different Blue
overview: During the same night, different stories intersect in the pursuit of a precious stamp.

title: Defray
overview: To defray their debts, two woman are sent to rob a hospital.
tagline: You're Almost There.

title: I delitti del BarLume - E allora zumba!
The Last Laugh
overview: A Cop and a Clown are at odds.

title: Slum Rat
overview: A fictional underworld employing minors in Colombo, Sri Lanka
tagline: micro film

title: Rangeli
overview: Rangeli is a ganagster story with a twist, offering a fresh perspective in Nepali cinema. With its unique elements and star-studded cast, the film is set to make waves not only in Nepal but also on the global stage.

title: The Bloody Savanna
overview: An investigation into a homicide at The Bloody Savanna nightclub leads further than two detectives could have possibly imagined...
tagline: ALL UNITS IN THE AREA PLEASE RESPOND...

title: Born to be Gone
overview: A young islamic woman who wants to expose the truth about the government's injustice in a patriarchal society.

title: The Massacre of Anroechte
overview: Nothing special happens in the quiet, peaceful, and sad German city of Anröchte. Until the day in which its residents’ daily lives are disrupted by strange events: Hun knights armed with sabers perpetrate an arbitrary massacre for no apparent reason, decapitating people at random. Inspector Konka arrives in town to solve the mistery, along with his faithful assistant Walter, a philosopher type who reflects on the human condition as he wanders the melancholic streets of Anröchte.

title: Sandookadee
overview: Sandookadee Follow the journey of two friends from Lahore to Punjab, where a mysterious trunk holds the key to their past, present, and future.

title: Khachar Bhitor Ochin Pakhi
overview: Two people stuck in a abandoned warehouse. A renowned politician and just an ordinary girl. Why are they stuck here? Is it their destiny or a result of a conspiracy? Or is it just an exchange of their fates, powers and life?
tagline: DESTINY OR CONSPIRACY ??

title: Onnam Sakshi Parethan
overview: The movie narrates a story of a man who unknowingly involved in a situation, never expecting that to happen. He then loses even the opportunity to explain what happened, and how he tries to survive is the story.

title: Vandales Du rail : Les graffeurs Face A La Justice
Calling Sahasra
overview: Cyber expert Ajay joins new job but past tragedy motivates avenging crimes on women using RESQ app anonymously. Mass calls draw him into murder case amidst rescuing women.

title: Tipping Point
overview: Enter the Watch Dogs Legion universe in this intense chase through a dystopian London created by Emmy awards winner Alberto Mielgo. This piece is the result of an artistic collaboration that will show you how, in Watch Dogs Legion, you can stop being a regular bystander and join the resistance family to get a chance to reclaim your future!

title: Duffle Bag Boy
overview: One year after separating from military service, Bruce hitchhikes his way into becoming an outlaw with all of its riches and glory. His tense relationship with kingpin, Maurice, brings chaos to the empire and results in an all-out war.
tagline: Prepare for war.

title: The Detective
overview: The worlds greatest detective, Sullivan Thatkase, sets out to solve the worlds realist case where things aren't what they seem.

title: Hungry Dog Blues
overview: Two estranged half-brothers kidnap the lead witness testifying against their father in order to prove his innocence.
tagline: You can't fight your nature.

title: The Last Tribe
overview: In November 2018, the news of the death of a 27-year-old American on the shore of a small island in the Indian Ocean went around the planet. Clash of the culture.
tagline: He wanted to bring salvation to the utter parts of the earth. They wanted to be left alone.

title: Uninvited for the Holidays
overview: A new age "family" Christmas comedy, a fish out of water story meets "Home Alone".
tagline: There's nothing like "family" during the holidays!

title: Tirandaj Shabor
overview: On March 12 rainy night, Sumit Ghoshal, a taxi driver arrives at a police station with a passenger who has suddenly taken ill. The O.C. inspects the passenger to find him dead. ACP-DD Shabor Dasgupta and Inspector Nanda must solve the case.

title: Dreamer
overview: The North Korean defector, who has just settled in the South, is confused by his brother who was separated from the defection process. Ji-hyeok, a Chinese restaurant deliveryman who is having a hard time finding a job due to his criminal record, wants to leave Korea as soon as possible. To raise money for his defector brother, Ji-hyeok, who is involved in a dangerous drug-transport errand, suggests intercepting billions of won of methamphetamine.

title: 1999 Hiraeth
overview: Ramfangzauva attempts to commit suicide after his wife dies due to complications that arise after she gives birth to their daughter Nuni. But before he can go through with it, he is visited by the ghost of his wife who shows him the future.
tagline: The choices made by Ramfangzauva sets off a chain reaction that influences not only his life but the lives of those around him.

title: Fall Nights in China Grove
overview: After backstabbing his criminal brother, 17-year-old Cullen stumbles upon a group of teens, with secrets of their own, that give him a taste of the youth he has missed. He soon learns that his whereabouts are not as hidden as he believes.

title: Belfast on the Rocks
overview: A potato-loving member of the Irish Republican Army searches for answers after the cold-blooded murder of his best friend.
tagline: Guinness. Potatoes. Murder.

title: Increasing Tension Between Me and the Possibility of Not Breathing as the Election Approaches
overview: when a double agent finds out he is going to be killed, he operates a series of murders.
tagline: ''The guerilla thinks there's a spy''

title: Continental
overview: A car thief has to risk it all when his next mission comes with an unpleasant surprise.

title: My Cherry Pie
overview: On the run, three criminals find themselves holed up at a notorious old hospital that happens to be the hunting ground of a masked killer.
tagline: All you need is one slice!

title: Raising a School Shooter
overview: As the disaster of yet another school shooting hits, some parents are faced with a brutal fact: their child was the one pulling the trigger.  Jeff Williams is the father of Andy, who in 2001, at the age of 15, shot and killed two classmates and wounded 13 other students. Andy, 25 at the time of filming, is now serving life in prison. Clarence Elliot’s son Nicholas shot and killed his teacher and wounded another in 1988. He too is serving life in prison. Sue Klebold’s son Dylan was one of the two teenagers behind the Columbine High School massacre in 1999, one of the deadliest school shootings in history. Dylan ended the shooting by committing suicide. Through the three parents' deeply personal stories and raw, honest testimony, the film explores multiple themes that emerge from terrible tragedies - guilt, failure, responsibility, sorrow, friendship and love.

title: Escape From Fremantle
overview: The year, 1952. After a father is sentenced to Fremantle Prison, he must hatch a daring escape with his friend; the cafeteria chef in order to make it to his young son's cricket game in time.

title: Bobby Butcher Goes Absolutely Freaking Insane
overview: Bobby Butcher, a washed out action movie star, becomes obsessed with proving himself as a versatile actor and will do anything it takes to develop his character, including hurting the people closest to him.
tagline: It's a good thing he does his own stunts

title: Watches
overview: A Korean American boy asks his older, troublesome friends to rob his home where he lives with his abusive father.

title: All About a Check
overview: Growing up marginalized in the hood, several women desperate to change their financial dynamic engage in seedy career choices that sends their lives and those around them into a downward spiral.

title: Bad Deal
overview: Two lowly drug dealers struggle to keep their cool in the aftermath of a deal that goes bad.

title: Catarina
overview: Ruined and abandoned by his wife, Francis is ready to do anything to win her back. With the help of his friend Simon, he decides to kidnap Catarina, the wife of the man who scammed him, in order to blackmail him and recover his savings.

title: Unkahee
overview: Join 6 murder suspects on their search to find the real killer amongst them. Among these suspects, one suspect is homosexual and another one likes to cross-dress. Watch the lives of these seemingly regular people change forever when they are pinned in a room and asked to find the serial killer hiding amongst them within 12 hours or face certain death. Will they be able to do what Delhi Police has been trying for the last 12 months?

title: Jagat
overview: When a 12-year-old boy goes missing on his way to school, things don't seem what they appear to Police Sub-Inspector Jagat Pandya. As he digs deeper, the one thing he has to keep is his patience. A tiny detail leads him to the sinister truth he wasn't prepared for.

title: Baltic Files
overview: The body of Christian Rommedahl, from Denmark, washes up on the Flensburg Fjord. The victim's friend and work colleague, Lasse Jørgensen, is the target of the new investigator duo Svenja Rasmussen and Antoine Haller. Another lead leads the inspector to the Flensburg liquor dealer Philipp Schaaf. There also seems to be a connection between him and the dead. Because photos of Schaaf's daughter Lisa are found on the dead person's cell phone, and Lasse also seems to be involved.

title: What She Wants
overview: A street-smart business woman becomes involved in a love triangle in order to succeed.
tagline: She gets.

title: Sotai 2: Organized Crime Unit vs. Anti-Social Forces
overview: "Crime City Shinjuku" - The Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department's Organized Crime Control Division, commonly known as "Sotai", keeps an eye on the dark side of society. Among them is a special section called the "Guerror Division," which was set up solely for the purpose of making a breakthrough in the investigation. Ushijima (Ryohei Abe) works hard to eliminate the Black Dragon Society, but he is unable to grasp the reality. As the investigation continues, Ushijima is targeted by people from the Black Dragon Society. When Ushijima, who was supposed to be a member of the guerrilla division and whose existence was not known, was targeted, he begins to suspect that there is a whistleblower.

title: Red Autumn
overview: A Experimental Docu-Drama about the Red Army Faction's formation, and events leading up to their imprisonment and death, from 1970 to 1977.
tagline: Solidarity with the global struggle against imperialism and fascism

title: 1744 White Alto
overview: Set in an unspecified place in Northern Kerala. Vijayan, a lowlife, gets himself involved in a case of mistaken identity. His car gets swapped with that of two small-time crooks Ebi and Kannan. With the local police, Mahesh and his team hot on their tails, a fun-filled cat-and-mouse chase ensues. What happens next is a series of comedy of errors. The story is flush with satire, suspense, and violence on the way to an unexpected climax.

title: Calls
overview: A BPO employee, who is annoyed with constant anonymous calls, gets kidnapped after leaving office. Will her parents be able to find her?
tagline: Beyond Communication

title: The Misadventures of Mica Raton
overview: Power-hungry mouse Mica Raton yearns for a hot new property to acquire, but his world is thrown into chaos and mystery when he dodges an assassination attempt from one of Gru's minions

title: Drill
tagline: A Hyderabadi Story

title: Old Man Slaughter
overview: Old Man Slaughter sets off on his own adventure against the Skinnies & MZ69
tagline: NO SENSE IN STANDING AROUND LIKE THAT ASS IS GONNA EAT ITSELF

title: Sharma & Ambani
overview: A ayurvedic doctor Sharma and his cobbler friend Ambanis simple lives are upended by an unexpected entanglement with a dangerous gang.They must fight to retrieve priceless diamonds and for Sharma to marry his childhood love.

title: I Bet You're Wondering How I Got Here
overview: A rag-tag group of thieves rob a bank. The only problem? They're all undercover cops, unaware of each other's identities.
tagline: Undercover. Unaware.

title: Persona’s Informed: Suspect With Three Faces
overview: Shishimai Wataru, a full-time househusband, was an excellent detective but retired after the murder of his wife, and lives a peaceful life while raising his only daughter in high school. One day, he is suddenly summoned by Motomura Shuta, a young man suspected in a "serial kidnapping case," and assigned to investigate the case. Moreover, Motomura suffers from Dissociative Identity Disorder (DID), a disorder in which several personalities appear interchangeably.

title: The Trials of Robert Durst
overview: From the suspicious disappearance of his wife to the brutal dismemberment of his neighbor and the murder of his best friend, this true-crime special tells the bizarre story of the life and criminal trials of the infamous real estate heir, Robert Durst.

title: Killer Bean Forever: Live Action
overview: The live action remake of the hit epic animated movie Killer Bean Forever
tagline: If You want to take him down you better bring Backup

title: Batman and Blue Joker in Trouble
overview: Batman finally catches The Joker and tries to interrogate him about the dissappearence of Herobrine, but Joker has become a blue lipstick liberal and now Batman has to discover his secrets, accompanied by his new companion - Robin / Terkel! The whole movie is improvized and has been made in less than a week
tagline: They have a problem....

title: Der Irland-Krimi: Mond über Galway
overview: Criminal psychologist Cathrin Blake is called to an emergency in the middle of the night: A young woman is threatening to throw herself to her death from a high-rise building. Cathrin knows the disturbed woman – Moon Flynn was in therapy with Cathrin a few years ago for a borderline disorder, but stopped it prematurely.

title: Trust Nobody
overview: A young hustler's thirst for power can make him destroy his own family, and a woman's greed can cause her to do the unthinkable.
tagline: On Milwaukee streets, there's only one golden rule.

title: B/B
overview: In 2020, the Tokyo Olympics have been cancelled due to the Olympic Minister’s corruption, and there was a failed poison gas attack by a new religion. In the shadows of these two major events, the brutal killing of a convenience store owner occurs. The incident is dubbed “Icarus.” Sana, who had contact with the owner’s son, Shiro, becomes the subject of interrogation by detectives. Suffering from dissociative identity disorder, she and the other personalities inside her each begin to recall events from their point of view.

title: Veembu
overview: Veembu is a Malayalam Movie directed by Vivian Radhakrishnan starring Shanavas sharaf, Shilpa chandran, Sujeesh v.v and Rajalakshmi v.v. The movie is produced by Rajesh Mohan M and the music composed by Jishnu dev

title: Psychos & Socios
overview: After his sister's death, a clairvoyant man confronts three of his unhinged, former classmates, to find the truth behind her death.

title: A Modern Gangster
overview: A delivery boy for the Pesaro crime family is tempted to see the contents of a package he has to deliver.

title: Alzheimer
overview: Jasmeet, aka James, lives in Canada. One day, he wakes up wounded in a strange place with no memory of the day. Watch to find out what happens next!

title: Sharp Instinct
overview: There's a killer on the loose, and there's not much time left to stop him. Will Detectives Patrick Knightley and Iain Wainwright, along with PC Terry Gallagher, PC Jon Banes and the Chief be able to catch him - or will he escape?
tagline: There's a killer on the loose

title: Patricia
overview: Trauma reporter Patricia Evangelista had a front-row view of the harshness and cruelty brought upon the lives of those who became victims of the Drug War under Duterte's administration. Witnessing the aftermath of violent killings, she struggles with the emotional toll of reporting on the victims and their families. Now, Patricia has no other choice but to persist and struggle amidst the grappling difficulties of fighting her internal battles and fighting the battles of those people whose stories she carries in every article and paper she writes.
tagline: WITNESS HER LIFE BEFORE SHE WITNESSES THE DEAD

title: Cash & Carry
overview: Four female housemates team up with a notorious gangster to swindle the son of a prominent Nigerian industrialist of his newly acquired inheritance, but their plan goes horribly wrong.

title: Substantial Evidence
overview: Valinda Battles is an attorney who has never lost a case. She is tasked with a case involving a double homicide that took place in her hometown On a night out, Valinda meets wealthy real estate broker, Bryant Sims, and soon fall for each other. Bryant's little brother, Tyrone, threatens their relationship, his brother's freedom, and has Valinda trapped in the middle.
tagline: Caught between the truth and lies... What will she choose?

title: Sentimentaaal
overview: Police officer Suryaa Roy, gets transferred to Raghunathpur where local politician Rudrani Chowdhury runs many illegal businesses. When they come at loggerheads, can Suryaa save his family and the people of Raghunathpur?
